sense.gloss: hustle and bustle (of life), worldly cares, impurities of the world
ritual gestures indicating that a fight will be clean
not at all, not the slightest
garbage can, rubbish bin, trash can, dustbin
object (perceived with the mind or the senses)
mineral dust, mine dust, fine particles, dust
trailing dust, dust left by someone running ahead
x: 後塵を拝する・こうじんをはいする・1

sense.gloss: kitchen waste, food scraps, raw garbage
large-size refuse (e.g. furniture, electrical goods), oversized garbage, bulky rubbish
useless man about the house, husband who is retired and considered a nuisance
dustproof clothing one would use in a cleanroom
broken into small fragments, smashed to atoms, fragments and splinters, smithereens
dreary world, petty affairs of everyday life

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑塵↑↓ちり↓を↑食↑↓た↓べさせようとしている。
sdata.e: He will make you eat dirt.

sdata.j: ↑塵↑↓ちり↓も↑積↑↓つ↓もれば↑山↑↓やま↓となる。
sdata.e: Many a little makes a mickle.

sdata.j: １↑年↑↓ねん↓が↑過↑↓す↓ぎ、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑死体↑↓したい↓は↑塵↑↓ちり↓と↑化↑↓か↓した。
sdata.e: A year had passed by and his body turned to dust.

sdata.j: ↑塵↑↓ちり↓も↑積↑↓つ↓もれば↑山↑↓やま↓となる。
sdata.e: Many a mickle makes a muckle.

sdata.j: ↑銀河系↑↓ぎんがけい↓は、お↑互↑↓たが↓いの↑重力↑↓じゅうりょく↓によって↑引↑↓ひ↓きつけ↑合↑↓あ↓っている↑星↑↓ほし↓や↑塵↑↓ちり↓そしてガスの↑塊↑↓かたまり↓です。
sdata.e: A galaxy is a cluster of stars, dust, and gas which is held together by gravity.

sdata.j: ↑宇宙↑↓うちゅう↓↑服↑↓ふく↓は↑宇宙↑↓うちゅう↓↑飛行↑↓ひこう↓↑士↑↓し↓たちを↑細↑↓こま↓かな↑宇宙塵↑↓うちゅうじん↓との↑衝突↑↓しょうとつ↓による↑怪我↑↓けが↓から↑守↑↓まも↓る。
sdata.e: Spacesuits protect astronauts from being injured from impacts of small bits of space dust.

sdata.j: ↑宇宙塵↑↓うちゅうじん↓はあまり↑危険↑↓きけん↓そうに↑思↑↓おも↓えないかもしれないが、ごく↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑粒↑↓つぶ↓であっても、↑銃弾↑↓じゅうだん↓の↑何↑↓なん↓↑倍↑↓ばい↓もの↑速度↑↓そくど↓で↑飛↑↓と↓んでくるので、↑怪我↑↓けが↓をしかねない。
sdata.e: Space dust may not sound very dangerous, but when even a tiny object is moving many times faster than a bullet, it can cause injury.

sdata.j: ↑不規則↑↓ふきそく↓↑銀河↑↓ぎんが↓とは↑構造↑↓こうぞう↓が↑不↑↓ふ↓↑確定↑↓かくてい↓であり、↑若↑↓わか↓い↑恒星↑↓こうせい↓や↑塵↑↓ちり↓、ガスを↑大量↑↓たいりょう↓に↑含↑↓ふく↓む。
sdata.e: An irregular galaxy has an undefined shape and is full of young stars, dust, and gas.
